layout.title: Reputation Management | Get More 5-Star Reviews
layout.description: Complete reputation management for spas and massage businesses. Get more reviews, respond professionally, and monitor your online reputation across all platforms automatically.

hero.title: Turn Happy Clients Into 5-Star Reviews
hero.text: Most happy customers never leave reviews - until you ask them the right way. Our reputation management system automatically asks for reviews at the perfect moment, responds professionally to all feedback, and monitors your reputation 24/7.

services.title: Your Reputation Is Your Most Valuable Asset
services.text: People trust online reviews as much as personal recommendations. More 5-star reviews means more customers, higher prices, and a constant stream of new bookings. We make getting reviews effortless.

items.title: Get More 5-Star Reviews
items.text: Automatically request reviews from happy customers at the perfect moment - right after their appointment. Our proven process gets 10x more reviews than asking manually.

items.title: Professional Review Responses
items.text: We respond to every review - positive and negative - professionally and promptly. Show potential customers you care about feedback and build even more trust.

items.title: Monitor All Platforms
items.text: Track reviews across Google, Facebook, Trustpilot, and all major platforms from one dashboard. Get instant notifications when new reviews arrive.

reviews.title: How Reputation Management Transformed These Businesses

items.text: We went from 12 Google reviews to 147 in just 6 months! Our average rating went from 4.2 to 4.9 stars. New customers constantly mention they chose us because of our excellent reviews. The system makes it so easy - it's completely automated.
items.name: Sophie Turner
items.title: Owner, Serenity Thai Spa

items.text: The review responses alone are worth it. Every review gets a professional, personalised response within hours. We've turned several negative reviews into repeat customers because of how well the responses were handled. Our bookings have increased 40% since we started.
items.name: Daniel Cooper
items.title: Manager, Urban Wellness Centre

features.boxText: Managing 50,000+ Reviews Across Our Client Base
features.title: Everything You Need to Build an Unbeatable Reputation
features.text: Our reputation management system doesn't just collect reviews - it actively builds your reputation, protects your business from negative feedback, and turns your satisfied customers into your best marketing channel.

items.title: Automatic Review Requests
items.text: Send review requests automatically via SMS or email after appointments. Perfectly timed for maximum response rates. Customers can leave reviews in seconds.

items.title: Smart Review Filtering
items.text: Happy customers go straight to public review sites. Unhappy customers get a private feedback form first, so you can resolve issues before they become public reviews.

items.title: Professional Response Writing
items.text: Every review gets a professional, personalised response. We handle the writing so responses are always appropriate, grateful, and build trust with potential customers reading them.

items.title: Multi-Platform Monitoring
items.text: Track reviews from Google, Facebook, Trustpilot, Yelp, and more from one dashboard. Never miss a review on any platform again.

items.title: Instant Notifications
items.text: Get notified immediately when new reviews arrive. Respond quickly to show you care and boost your reputation even further.

items.title: Review Analytics & Insights
items.text: See trends in your reviews, track your average rating over time, and identify areas for improvement. Make data-driven decisions to improve your service.
